header.title: Frankenau
header.intro: In August 2020, amidst the COVID-19 restrictions, our family embarked on a memorable vacation to Frankenau, Germany. Despite the necessary precautions like wearing masks, we cherished the time spent together in this picturesque destination. The trip served as a reminder of the resilience and adaptability of our family, creating lasting memories in the midst of challenging circumstances.

image.alt: Together with my family in Frankenau
